products.name: Classic White T-Shirt
products.description: A timeless white t-shirt made from 100% organic cotton. Perfect for everyday wear with a comfortable fit and durability that lasts through multiple washes.

products.name: Slim-Fit Jeans
products.description: Modern slim-fit jeans with a touch of stretch for maximum comfort. Features a classic five-pocket design and is perfect for casual outings.

products.name: Leather Sneakers
products.description: Premium leather sneakers with a minimalist design. Features cushioned insoles and rubber outsoles for all-day comfort and durability.

products.name: Casual Dress Shirt
products.description: A versatile button-up shirt that transitions effortlessly from office to casual settings. Made from breathable cotton with a modern cut.

products.name: Leather Belt
products.description: Genuine leather belt with a classic buckle design. A timeless accessory that adds sophistication to any outfit.

products.name: Silver Minimalist Watch
products.description: A sleek, minimalist watch with a stainless steel case and band. Features a quartz movement and water resistance up to 30 meters.

products.name: Wool Beanie
products.description: Soft, warm beanie made from premium wool blend. Perfect for cold weather with a comfortable fit and stylish look.

products.name: Ankle Boots
products.description: Stylish ankle boots with genuine leather upper and rubber sole. Features a side zipper for easy on and off.

products.name: Silver Pendant Necklace
products.description: Elegant sterling silver pendant necklace featuring a minimalist design. Adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit.

products.name: Canvas Tote Bag
products.description: Durable canvas tote bag with reinforced handles. Perfect for shopping, beach trips, or as a casual everyday bag.

products.name: Stainless Steel Earrings
products.description: Simple yet elegant stainless steel hoop earrings. Hypoallergenic and suitable for everyday wear.

products.name: Denim Jacket
products.description: Classic denim jacket with button closure and multiple pockets. A versatile piece that never goes out of style.
